channel.title: Uncertainty on The Little Dataset
channel.description: Recent content in Uncertainty on The Little Dataset

item.title: 'Serial' and Changes of Heart
item.description: Intro During this past/last week of the podcast Serial, Sarah Koenig explains (unsurprisingly) that throughout her journalistic investigation of the murder of Hae Min Lee she has changed her opinion many times about Adnan’s guilt or innocence: Several times, I have landed on a decision, I’ve made up my mind and stayed there, with relief and then inevitably, I learn something I didn’t know before and I’m up ended.
